alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alachua County through 830 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newnans Lake, or near Gainesville, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, University Of Florida, Orange Heights, Gainesville Airport, Rochelle and Newnans Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
